attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The spineless excuse of human life form must resign, not elected, not wanted. 

Thanks to this paramecium, this overpriced and overtaxed country is on the brink of disaster. We succumb to every immigrants needs, the police have no power and education is a joke.

Any Tom, Dick and Harry, so long as they are called Mustapha , Abdul and Mohamed are being allowed to dictate the laws of the land.

Quit now Brown…Your not very good at your job, never have been, never will be

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
